message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $250.
I'm interested in the product, but $250 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $180.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $250 might be a bit steep for you. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm counteroffering at $220. This is the lowest I'm willing to go, but I think it's a fair price for this unique product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $220 is still a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $190. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.
